#summary Acceptance criteria scenarios on User Story 20

*User Story*

As contest manager<br/>
I want to delete registrations<br/>
so that I can remove contestants' accounts<br/>

*Scenario 1*

  # Register some users
  # Log as admin
  # Go to "Manage Registration" page
  # Select one account. Delete it and check if it is deleted properly

*Scenario 2*

  # Register some users
  # Log as admin
  # Go to "Manage Registration" page
  # Select more than one account. Delete them and check if they are deleted properly
